graph.coarsening

Class HCoarsenerIEC

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.coarsening.HCoarsener
      • graph.coarsening.HCoarsenerIEC

  • public class HCoarsenerIEC
extends HCoarsener
    edge-based hyper-coarsener. Class is not thread-safe, and so should be protected by clients when used in a multi-threaded context.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2015

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void coarsen()
      coarsen() performs the following loop until the number of unmatched nodes is less than a ratio of the orinigal nodes: (1) we visit an unvisited node randomly; (2) we match it with the "best" neighbor according to the result of the method getBestNbor(id); (3) we mark as visited both nodes that were matched of course.
      private HNode getBestNbor(java.lang.Integer pos)
      find the best neighbor that should be matched with node at position pos.
      private double getCommonWeight(HNode n1, HNode n2)

      implementation of base class method, this factory method constructs a new instance of this class.

      • coarsen

        public void coarsen()
             throws GraphException,
                    CoarsenerException
        coarsen() performs the following loop until the number of unmatched nodes is less than a ratio of the orinigal nodes: (1) we visit an unvisited node randomly; (2) we match it with the "best" neighbor according to the result of the method getBestNbor(id); (3) we mark as visited both nodes that were matched of course. The properties map for this object must contain the key-value pair <"coarsening.HCoarsener.HCoarsenerIEC.ratio", Double ratio>. Must also contain a pair <"coarsening.HCoarsener.HCoarsenerIEC.max_allowed_card",Integer num>.
        Specified by:
        coarsen in class HCoarsener
        Throws:
        GraphException
        CoarsenerException - if coarsening couldn't proceed satisfactorily

      • getBestNbor

        private HNode getBestNbor(java.lang.Integer pos)
        find the best neighbor that should be matched with node at position pos. The best neighbor is the one maximizing the value sum_{f(conn_arcs_weight)} as implemented in getCommonWeight()
        Parameters:
        pos - Integer
        Returns:
        Node
